title: The Sepia Ball
description: 1920s Intrigue.During the silent silver screen era, a Hollywood director makes a motion picture about the madman he had for a father. Defying family pleas not to make the exploitive movie, Glen Rayburn unleashes his brand of anger via "sepia" horror movies, and rises to fame and fortune in the Tinseltown of power and greed.
author: Shelly Schwartz
